h2.a: Palacios ISD Facilities Closed Until Further Notice

div.div: Superintendent Dr. Missy Glenn announced that Palacios ISD offices and campuses, including the tax office, will be closed until furtherâ€¦

div.script: jQuery(document).ready(function($) { var slider = $("#ticker_feed240").lightSlider({ item: 4, autoWidth: false, slideMove: 1, slideMargin: 5, auto: false, loop: true, controls: true, rtl: false, pager: false, speed: 400, responsive : [ { breakpoint:960, settings: { item: 3 } }, { breakpoint:768, settings: { item: 2 } }, { breakpoint:600, settings: { item: 2 } }, { breakpoint:480, settings: { item: 1 } } ] }); $('#timeline_feed240 .sb-tabs li').click(function(event) { $('#timeline_feed240 .sb-tabs li').removeClass('active'); if ( $('#timeline_feed240').hasClass('open') ) { if ( $(this).hasClass( 'active' ) ) { $('#timeline_feed240').removeClass('open'); } else { $(this).addClass('active'); } } else { $(this).addClass('active'); $('#timeline_feed240').addClass('open'); } event.preventDefault(); });$("#timeline_feed240 .iframe").colorbox({iframe:true, innerWidth:640, innerHeight:390});$("#timeline_feed240 .icbox").colorbox({photo:true, maxWidth:"95%", maxHeight:"95%"}); /* resize colorbox on screen rotation */ $(window).resize(function() { if (jQuery("#cboxOverlay").is(":visible")) { jQuery.colorbox.resize({maxWidth:"95%", maxHeight:"95%"}); } }); });
